revised_title: Redetermination of Colour Sensation Curves with a Modified Apparatus
tldr: The author developed a modified color patch apparatus to accurately measure and compare color sensations. Using this new apparatus, they redetermined the visual sensation curves and found that the previously proposed fourth sensation in the violet is unnecessary. The study also provided a more accurate determination of the inherent white in the green sensation and the blue sensation in the yellow and green part of the spectrum.
